_comment: Maps pages/modules to their saveable state variables for the preset system

variables: list of variable names to save/restore
registry_slots: list of registry slot IDs to include

vibrato.description: Vibrato module - saves division, depth, widget dot positions

tremolo.description: Tremolo module - placeholder for future implementation

mixer.description: Mixer page - placeholder for future implementation

patchbay.description: Patchbay page - placeholder for future implementation
